about-text: Solar Enterprises stands at the forefront of advancing the Solar Network ecosystem, a dynamic initiative rooted in the visionary principles of the Solar Blockchain Foundation. We are committed to propelling the growth and evolution of the Solar Network through the delivery of cutting-edge solutions and services. Our mission encapsulates a dedication to innovation, aiming to significantly impact the network's development and ensure its long-term success.
about-tymt: Developed by Solar Enterprises, the same innovative minds behind District 53 Metaverse, tymt is a promising solution set to revolutionize the gaming industry. This next-generation game launcher bridges the gap between traditional and Web3 games, overcoming the challenges that have often hampered blockchain gaming.
about-district53: District 53 a decentralised multiverse built on the Solar blockchain and forked from Minetest. It offers users the ability to purchase virtual land, trade with other users, advertise on their property, and interact with the blockchain. With a wide range of activities to participate in, the District 53 metaverse has something for everyone, Join us today to explore this exciting new world!
about-solarcard: The Solar Card is your gateway to the world of crypto and fiat transactions. It offers a flexible, secure way to manage your finances, with features like fiat wallets, custodian crypto wallets by Kraken, and an internal SXP wallet, including prepaid options without KYC up to 5000 euros.
